text.text_translated:
Chloe arrived home from school and made a cup of coffee.  
She took the coffee to her bedroom.  
She had homework, but she could wait until later.  
She wanted to enjoy a quiet hour before her parents came home.  
When they arrived, the house would fill up with evening sounds.  
The sounds were chatter, TV, and jazz music her dad liked.  
He cooked dinner while the jazz played.  
She liked this time because she could play with her pet rats.
